data.title: How to Watch Nick Jr Live Without Cable 2024 - Top 6 Options
data.meta_description: Are you a cord-cutter interested in watching Nick Jr live without cable? Here are the best options for streaming without cable!
data.text:
Affiliate Disclosure

Flixed.io's contributors and editorial team will often recommend products we believe to be useful for our readers. We may receive an affiliate commission from product sales generated through these affiliate links.

There are many ways to watch Nick Jr without cable, including Hulu Live TV, Philo, YouTube TV, Sling, Fubo, or DirecTV Stream.

But our team's pick for most people to watch Nick Jr , is DirecTV Stream . Here's why:

Big families (or roommates or friends) can watch DirecTV Stream without stress, as they offer up to -1 simultaneous streams.

DirecTV Stream is available in every region of the United States. (Viewers outside the US can try to access DirecTV Stream with a VPN, like ExpressVPN — or one of our other top VPNs.)

If, for whatever reason, watching Nick Jr on DirecTV Stream doesn't work for you, we've also rounded up 5 more options — and we even divided them up into the best picks for people who also watch lots of sports, news, reality TV, and more . Let's get into the best options for everyone.

Our top 6 picks for streaming Nick Jr without cable

Top pick: Stream Nick Jr on DirecTV Stream

If you're looking for the best way to stream Nick Jr , DirecTV Stream is our team's top pick. Using our streaming recommendation system, the Flixed team has determined that DirecTV Stream is the best way for most people to watch what's live on Nick Jr because it offers the ideal combination of price, channels, and features.

Other channels on DirecTV Stream include: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and more.

Devices supported by DirecTV Stream include: android , web-browsers , chromecast , ios , amazon-fire-tv , android-tv , and samsung-tv .

Our DirecTV Stream review also includes more about why our team loves DirecTV Stream .

Budget pick: Stream Nick Jr on Philo

Philo is the true definition of a bargain streamer, with the lowest price point of all our recommended streamers. Though its missing sports and local news channels, there’s still 70+ other channels to choose from along with on-demand content as well.

Other channels on Philo include: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and more.

Take a look at what's live on Philo right now.

Devices supported by Philo include: android , web-browsers , ios , android-tv , amazon-fire-tv , and apple-tv .

Our team shares even more comprehensive analysis of Philo in our Philo review. For the true budget streamer, we've also compiled a list of our favorite free streaming services.

Sports fan pick: Stream Nick Jr on Fubo

Most sports fans already know and love Fubo. If you're trying to watch Nick Jr without cable and you also watch a lot of sports, Fubo is probably the best pick for you.

With its focus on sports content, fuboTV is a haven for any sports lovers out there. Despite its lack of ESPN, the service offers almost every league, including NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, and more. With upwards of a thousand hours of DVR space and multiple simultaneous streams available, you’ll never miss a game. At its cheapest plan, fuboTV offers 140+ channels to choose from, so you’ll have access to more than just sports as well.

Other channels on Fubo include: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and more.

Some sports might be live on Fubo right now.

Devices supported by Fubo include: android , ios , chromecast , web-browsers , vizio , and samsung-tv .

Fubo isn't only great for sports fans, though. Our team took Fubo for a test drive and put all of our thoughts together in our Fubo review.

Plus, we've compiled a list of the best overall streaming services for sports fans.

News fan pick: Stream Nick Jr on YouTube TV

If you're someone who watches a lot of news, you probably want to subscribe to a streamer with access to the most popular news channels. No reason to subscribe to a different streaming service just to get access to Nick Jr . Our top pick for most news fans to get access to Nick Jr is YouTube TV. Plenty of news shows are airing live now on YouTube TV.

With its focus on sports and news channels, Youtube TV is a great choice for people looking to stay up to date with all the latest news. The service offers network channels like ABC News, FOX News, NBC News, BBC World News, CNBC, CNN, Cheddar News, MSNBC, and more.

Other channels on YouTube TV include: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and more.

Devices supported by YouTube TV include: chromecast , web-browsers , android , android-tv , apple-tv , and samsung-tv .

We've written even more about why we like YouTube TV, but another great option for streaming local news is an OTA antenna. News fans often use antennas for streaming live TV like news shows for free, without cable.

Movie fan pick: Stream Nick Jr on Hulu Live TV

You're probably not after Nick Jr for on-demand movies, but we all know movies are one of streaming's greatest advantages. If you love a good flick as much as our team, you should subscribe to Hulu Live TV to watch Nick Jr . Some movies might even be live on Hulu Live TV right now.

With the addition of its sprawling on-demand content, Hulu + Live TV is a perfect choice for movie lovers who are looking for a variety of films to choose from, both on live tv and on-demand. Couple that with the Disney+ on-demand library as well, and you have all of the film selection you could need.

Other channels on Hulu Live TV include: , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and more.

Devices supported by Hulu Live TV include: chromecast , web-browsers , ios , android-tv , apple-tv , amazon-fire-tv , and lg-tv .

Read our Hulu Live TV review.

All the streaming services where Nick Jr is or isn't available

The choices for watching Nick Jr aren't limited to our top picks. Here's where you can and can't watch Nick Jr without cable.

Watching Nick Jr on top devices

No matter what device you have at home, it's probably possible to watch Nick Jr on it — yes, even without cable. Read on to learn which streamers support both your device and Nick Jr live streams.

How to watch Nick Jr on Roku devices

It's definitely possible to watch Nick Jr on your Roku device, be it a streaming stick or actual Roku TV. Subscribe to Hulu Live TV, Philo, YouTube TV, Sling, Fubo, or DirecTV Stream to get Nick Jr on Roku.

How to watch Nick Jr on an Android smart TV

Have a Samsung smart TV or another type of Android TV? These are some of the easiest to use to get Nick Jr access without cable. Just subscribe to Hulu Live TV, Philo, YouTube TV, Sling, or DirecTV Stream to get Nick Jr on your Android smart TV.

How to watch Nick Jr on an Amazon Fire TV

Whether you have a Fire TV Stick or a Cube or another device, you can get access to Nick Jr . Alexa, sign up for to Hulu Live TV, Philo, Sling, or DirecTV Stream to get Nick Jr on Amazon devices.

How to stream Nick Jr on iOS

Have an iPhone? An iPad? Not every app is available on Apple's App Store, but depending on the streaming service you. have, you can watch Nick Jr on an iOS device with ease. Subscribe to Hulu Live TV, Philo, Sling, Fubo, or DirecTV Stream to get Nick Jr on your iOS device.

How to watch Nick Jr on Android phones

You can watch Nick Jr on your Pixel or Samsung or Nokia or whatever type of Android you have! Just subscribe to Philo, YouTube TV, Sling, Fubo, or DirecTV Stream to get Nick Jr on Android phones.

The bottom line: you have 6 great options for watching without cable

We found 6 great options for watching without cable. While our top pick is DirecTV Stream , there are 5 other ways to watch live programming, including Hulu Live TV or Philo . The cheapest option is Hulu Live TV .

Check out what's airing right now in our TV Guide. Then, read up on the business of streaming in the Stream Report and the most popular streaming content in The Popcorner.
